description:
Analyze project files (package.json, requirements.txt, go.mod, etc.) and automatically suggest the most appropriate base template and common customizations for that project type.

**Rationale:** Choosing and configuring the right template requires knowledge of available options and best practices. Automated recommendations reduce setup time and leverage community expertise.
title: Smart template recommendations
